Yea, this week, we are talking about new classes that are promotions 
of existing classes as well as continuing the discussion on any 
character classes.  Let's here those new ideas.

I would bring back the idea of a couple of promoted characters:

1)practical mage - same basic attack A mage,
with teleport and leave teleport marker as 1st attack
with stop time and slow down time as 2nd attack
teleport teammates and teleport opponents as 3rd attack
create teleporter and create blackhole (anything steps inside is 
killed) as 4th attack.

The blackhole would be one of the most powerfull attacks.

2)High priest, same basic type as cleric,
1st attack = heal/mystic mace
2nd attack = wide area heal/greater heal (heal beyond 100% health)
3rd attack = summon curse/undo curse (random selection of which curse 
is applied from many choices)
4th attack = resurrect character / reincarinate character
